title: California, Oregon, Washington to End School Mask Mandates on March 12
sub_head: West Coast states are latest run by Democrats to relax restrictions as Omicron surge fades
body:
California, Oregon and Washington will end their statewide mask mandates for schools and other indoor settings by March 12, in a coordinated move announced Monday.
California, which lifted its indoor mask requirement for vaccinated people on Feb. 15, is ending it for unvaccinated people on Tuesday. Oregon and Washington will take the same step March 12, the same day that all three West Coast states will no longer require masks inside schools.
